arts.ttl: Rooney sent off as Plymouth score late winner
arts.sum: Plymouth Argyle head coach Wayne Rooney was sent off during his side's Championship match against Blackburn Rovers.

arts.ttl: Wayne Rooney SENT OFF as furious Man Utd legend blasts referee before 97th-minute drama
arts.sum: Wayne Rooney experienced a rollercoaster of emotions on Saturday, firstly being sent off as manager of Plymouth Argyle before his side scored a 97th minute winner to beat Blackburn Rovers

arts.ttl: John Eustace left 'frustrated' after late goal sinks Blackburn Rovers
arts.sum: The Blackburn Rovers head coach gave his reaction after Plymouth Argyle's 97th-minute winning goal

arts.ttl: Wayne Rooney sent off as Plymouth claim dramatic late win over Blackburn
arts.sum: The former England striker was incensed by Blackburn’s equaliser and was sent to the stands.

arts.ttl: Plymouth claim last-ditch win | But Rooney misses it after red card!
arts.sum: Manager Wayne Rooney was sent off as Plymouth secured a dramatic 2-1 win over Blackburn at Home Park.

arts.ttl: Morgan Whittaker leaves it late to secure Plymouth victory over Blackburn
arts.sum: Whittaker nodded home Adam Randell’s header back into the goalmouth.

arts.ttl: Blackburn Rovers fall to last-minute defeat at Plymouth Argyle
arts.sum: Morgan Whittaker's 97th-minute winner secured three points for the hosts

arts.ttl: Blackburn Rovers player ratings as substitutes impress but starters struggle
arts.sum: Marks out of ten as Blackburn Rovers fall to a late defeat at Plymouth Argyle

arts.ttl: Plymouth Argyle vs Blackburn Rovers LIVE: Score updates from Home Park
arts.sum: Live updates of Blackburn Rovers' trip to Home Park in the Championship

arts.ttl: Little Mix star finally ends Saudi 'hell' as husband signs for Wayne Rooney
arts.sum: Plymouth have landed the signing of Andre Gray with Wayne Rooney moving to bring in the free agent after his Saudi experience with his wife, formerly of Little Mix, likely thrilled by his return
